repnme.cdata!: Chile - Third Structural Adjustment Loan Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Structural Adjustment Loan
            Project supports the Government's structural adjustment
            program. The main areas covered by the Government's
            medium-term program include: (i) measures to maintain and
            strengthen incentives for noncopper exports; (ii) steps to
            increase public savings and the efficiency of public
            expenditures; (iii) measures to improve the mobilization and
            allocation of long-term savings; and (iv) measures to
            improve public efforts in the social sectors. The loan aims
            to finance all imports, with the exception of luxury items
            and military goods.
